title: MAGNETIC PASSES FOR A DEEP TRANSFORMATION / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
These are the students of Dr. Paret and they are doing non-verbal hypnosis exercises with magnetic passes. Magnetic passes work without touching the person, but the body feels strong sensations and even starts to move. Non-verbal hypnosis can deeply transform and heal us. Next month you have the chance to learn these powerful techniques from the best teachers. Visit hypnose.academy/mesmerische_hypnose for more information about the upcoming course in Switzerland in October. 
Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Subscribe to our YouTube channel for more free lessons and useful techniques:
